title: I dont know what exactly this font is but please help me i need it immediately!!!!
author: shahid24x7

comments.content: Aubrey is simply [Nueva](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828185037/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/nueva/) with the serifs snipped off. How creative ... NOT!
Nueva was a MM font - I wonder how many versions got made out of it, not counting snipping off the serifs
